name: Correlate Solutions File
summary: A KMS file is a data file created by Correlate Client, a Windows program used to create shortcuts to files and organize them in one document. It contains a structure of one or more shortcuts to files. KMS files are commonly used to store links to business, human resource, project, and productivity-related files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: KMS file open in Correlate Client
images.alt: KMS file open in Correlate Client
